Robert Joseph Mettle-Nunoo nke a makwaara dị ka Rojo Mettle Nunoo bụ onye na-ese ihe ugbu a na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ghana. Ọ bụ onye otu National Democratic Congress ma jee ozi dị ka osote minista ahụike n'oge ọchịchị John Evans Atta Mills.
Mettle-Nunoo nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts na nka (ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ) site na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah

Na Jenụwarị 2009, Onye isi ala John Evans Atta Mills họpụtara Mettle-Nunoo dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka okporo ụzọ na okporo ụzọ. Mgbe mgbanwe nke ndị minista gasịrị, a kpọgara ya ije ozi dị ka osote minista ahụike. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye njikwa mkpọsa nke John Atta Mills na Disemba 2008.
